list.title: _location
list.description: Returns the location of a specified utility in a given script or module.

list.title: AScriptUtils#getU32
list.description: Gets a 32-bit unsigned integer value from the specified memory pointer.

list.title: AScriptUtils#liftTypedArray
list.description: Lifts a TypedArray from the module's memory.

list.title: AScriptUtils#lowerTypedArray
list.description: Lowers a TypedArray to the module's memory.

list.title: AScriptUtils#releaseP
list.description: Releases a memory pointer and decrements its reference count.

list.title: AScriptUtils#retainP
list.description: Retains a memory pointer and increments its reference count.

list.title: AScriptUtils#setU32
list.description: Sets a 32-bit unsigned integer value at the specified memory pointer.

list.title: ASModule
list.description: Load and instantiate a WebAssembly module from the ASUtils script directory.

list.title: ASUtils
list.description: This namespace should have avaialble all the modules that have been added into the AS-compiled web assembly folder.

list.title: availableScripts
list.description: Anything else that has to be imported into the library's usage has to be added here

list.title: avScripts
list.description: Retrieves all available scripts and their modules.

list.title: bindGroup
list.description: Creates a bind group.

list.title: bindLayout
list.description: Creates a bind group layout.

list.title: bufferCreator
list.description: Creates a buffer for the matrix data.

list.title: bufferDestroyer
list.description: Destroys the buffers.

list.title: CModule
list.description: Asynchronously loads and creates a module from a C script.

list.title: concatArrays
list.description: Helper function for concatenating arrays.

list.title: createAnswer
list.description: Creates the answer for WebRTC.

list.title: createOfferDescription
list.description: Creates the offer description for WebRTC.

list.title: CUtils
list.description: CUtils object containing the names of C module files to be interfaced.

list.title: deviceConnect#adapter
list.description: The WebGPU adapter.

list.title: deviceConnect#addLostListener
list.description: Adds a lost listener to the device.

list.title: deviceConnect#device
list.description: The WebGPU device.

list.title: deviceConnect#initDevice
list.description: Requests the adapter and device for WebGPU.

list.title: deviceConnect#initialize
list.description: Initializes the device and adds a lost listener to it.

list.title: deviceConnect#lostListener
list.description: The listener for device loss event.

list.title: deviceConnect#recoverDevice
list.description: Recovers the device after it has been lost.

list.title: deviceConnect#removeLostListener
list.description: Removes the lost listener from the device.

list.title: engine
list.description: main engine driver for all the available modules in the hydrocompute library

list.title: engine.availableScripts
list.description: Returns all the available scripts for each of the engines

list.title: engine.concurrentRun
list.description: Runs multiple tasks concurrently using worker threads and dependency graph.

list.title: engine.initialize
list.description: setter for the current engine name and worker location

list.title: engine.parallelRun
list.description: Runs multiple tasks in parallel using worker threads.

list.title: engine.run
list.description: interface method from the compute layer. it resets the values for each of the

list.title: engine.setEngine
list.description: resets all properties of the class

list.title: engine.stepRun
list.description: main method for running a simulation. It sets up the way of running the computational engine for each module

list.title: engine.taskRunner
list.description: Executes tasks based on the provided dependencies and step counter.

list.title: ErrorTypes.NotFound
list.description: Used whenever there is an error raised because of not found file(s)

list.title: ErrorTypes.NotImplemented
list.description: Used whenever there is a DOM Exception for not found / not impleemented in the compute

list.title: ErrorTypes.ValueErr
list.description: Used whenever there is a value type error when running the engine

list.title: filterFunctionKeys
list.description: Filters the function keys of an object, excluding specific keys.

list.title: getAllModules
list.description: Retrieves all available modules.

list.title: globalUtils.arrayChanger
list.description: switches the rows/columns of an array

list.title: globalUtils.DAG
list.description: Directed Acyclic Graph implementation for solving promised-based functions adopted from https://github.com/daanmichiels/promiseDAG

list.title: globalUtils.dataCloner
list.description: Deep clones either objects or arrays

list.title: globalUtils.exports.flattenFloat32Array
list.description: Helper function for flatennizing a 2D array

list.title: globalUtils.exports.getPerformanceMeasures
list.description: Retrieves the performance measures for function execution and worker execution.

list.title: globalUtils.exports.importJSONdata
list.description: Imports JSON data from a file.

list.title: gpuUtils
list.description: Retrieves the available GPU scripts and their corresponding functions.

list.title: gpuUtils.deviceConnect
list.description: Class representing device connection and management for WebGPU.

list.title: gpuUtils.exports.dispatchers
list.description: Dispatches a compute shader operation on the GPU.

list.title: gpuUtils.exports.shaderModule
list.description: Function returns a shader module back for usage in the compute section

list.title: gpuUtils.matrixUtils
list.description: Utility functions for matrix operations using GPU shaders.

list.title: groupEntry
list.description: Creates a group entry to be bound into the layout group.

list.title: hydroCompute
list.description: Main class for the compute modules. It creates instances of the different engines available to run concurrent or parallel code instances.

list.title: hydroCompute
list.description: Constructs a new hydroCompute instance.

list.title: hydrocompute.isEngineSet
list.description: Verifies that an engine is set

list.title: hydroCompute#availableEngines
list.description: Retrieves the available engines.

list.title: hydroCompute#availableResults
list.description: Retrieves the available results stored in the engineResults object.

list.title: hydroCompute#availableSplits
list.description: Searches the function splits available for data manipulation

list.title: hydroCompute#currentEngine
list.description: Returns the name of the current engine.

list.title: hydroCompute#data
list.description: Saves the provided data into the available data storage.

list.title: hydroCompute#engineScripts
list.description: Retrieves the available engine scripts.

list.title: hydroCompute#getResTimes
list.description: Retrieves the total function time and total script time for a specific result.

list.title: hydroCompute#getTotalTime
list.description: Calculates the total function time and total script time for all available results.

list.title: hydroCompute#makeId
list.description: Generates a random ID string.

list.title: hydroCompute#results
list.description: Retrieves the results for a specific simulation by name.

list.title: hydroCompute#run
list.description: Runs the specified functions with the given arguments using the current engine.

list.title: hydroCompute#setEngine
list.description: Sets the current engine based on the specified kernel.

list.title: hydroCompute#setResults
list.description: Sets the results of the current engine and stores them in the engineResults object.

list.title: hydroCompute#setTotalTime
list.description: Calculates and sets the total function time and total script time for each result in the engineResults object.

list.title: hydroCompute#utils.cleanArray
list.description: Cleans the array by removing Infinity, null, undefined, and NaN values.

list.title: hydroCompute#utils.genRandomData
list.description: Generates random data.

list.title: initialize
list.description: Initializes the WebRTC engine.

list.title: jsScripts
list.description: Retrieves the JavaScript scripts and their associated functions.

list.title: layoutEntry
list.description: Creates a layout entry to be bound into the layout group.

list.title: loadModule
list.description: Loads a module based on the script name and module name.

list.title: LUDecomposition
list.description: decomposition of a matrix to its LeftUpper form

list.title: matrixChanger
list.description: Changes the matrix layout by removing the sizes.

list.title: matrixExpo
list.description: powers up the elements in a matrix to the given number

list.title: matrixSize
list.description: Returns the sizes of two square matrices.

list.title: matrixUtils
list.description: Utility functions for matrix operations.

list.title: matrixUtils.conv2d_js
list.description: Creates a convolution of a 2D matrix.

list.title: matrixUtils.main
list.description: Runs the specified function in the matrixUtils object with the given data.

list.title: matrixUtils.matrixAdd_gpu
list.description: Performs matrix multiplication using a GPU shader.

list.title: matrixUtils.matrixAdd_js
list.description: Performs matrix addition.

list.title: matrixUtils.matrixMultiply_gpu
list.description: Performs matrix multiplication using a GPU shader.

list.title: matrixUtils.matrixMultiply_js
list.description: Performs matrix multiplication using the naive dot product.

list.title: module.exports
list.description: Constructs a new instance of the WebRTC engine.

list.title: module.exports#module.exports
list.description: constructor to set the property variables ready for execution

list.title: module:kernels
list.description: main kernel workers used for computation. Any additional backends will be added here.

list.title: module:scripts
list.description: Any script that is added into the worker is added here and the import/export list should be updated accordingly.

list.title: onAvailableChannel
list.description: Handles the available channel for WebRTC.

list.title: oncloseHost
list.description: Handles the event when the data channel is closed on the host machine.

list.title: oncloseReceiver
list.description: Handles the event when the data channel is closed on the receiver machine.

list.title: openConnection
list.description: Opens the connection for WebRTC.

list.title: restartDataChannel
list.description: Restarts the data channel from a host with an already RTC connection.

list.title: resultHolder
list.description: Creates a buffer to hold the result matrix.

list.title: run
list.description: Runs the WebRTC engine.

list.title: sendData
list.description: Sends data through WebRTC.

list.title: setConnection
list.description: Sets the connection for WebRTC.

list.title: setDataChannel
list.description: Sets the connection for WebRTC.

list.title: setOfferDescription
list.description: Sets the offer description for WebRTC.

list.title: splits
list.description: Collection of functions to be used for splitting data across HydroCompute

list.title: splits.divideIntoSubmatrices
list.description: Divides a matrix into submatrices.

list.title: splits.join
list.description: Joins chunks of data together.

list.title: splits.main
list.description: Runs a specific split function based on the provided name and data.

list.title: splits.split1DArray
list.description: Splits a 1D array into N different chunks.

list.title: splits.splitMatrix
list.description: Splits a matrix into two submatrices.

list.title: splits.splitmDArray
list.description: Splits each array from a 2D matrix into N different chunks.

list.title: submitArray
list.description: Submits an array of data through WebRTC.

list.title: threadManager
list.description: Main class for managing threads. Results and execution time are saved here

list.title: threadManager.createWorkerThread
list.description: Holder for the workers created by the class. It creates an object that contains the workers defined by the execution context holding the execution time of each thread and the worker itself.

list.title: threadManager.execTime
list.description: Retrives all the execution times of a worker thread. It is triggered within the engine class.

list.title: threadManager.initializeWorkerThread
list.description: Method initializer of the threads found in the workerThread object. It attaches each of the properties into the object.

list.title: threadManager.resetWorkers
list.description: Resets all the workers set to work in the compute engine.

list.title: timeSeries
list.description: Collection of time series analysis functions.

list.title: timeSeries.dspItrend_js
list.description: Calculates the DSP iTrend for time series analysis.

list.title: timeSeries.expoMovingAverage_js
list.description: Calculates the exponential moving average for time series analysis.

list.title: timeSeries.linearWeightedAverage_js
list.description: Calculates the linear weighted average for time series analysis.

list.title: timeSeries.main
list.description: Runs the specified function in the timeSeries object with the given data.

list.title: timeSeries.noiseSmoother_js
list.description: Calculates the noise smoother for time series analysis.

list.title: timeSeries.simpleMovingAverage_js
list.description: Calculates the simple moving average for time series analysis.

list.title: Worker.module:GPUWorker
list.description: Web worker script for executing GPU computations.

list.title: Worker.module:GPUWorker~self.onmessage
list.description: Event listener for the 'message' event.

list.title: Workers.module:JSWorker
list.description: Event listener for the 'message' event.

list.title: Workers.module:WASMWorker
list.description: Web worker script for executing WASM computations.

list.title: Workers.module:WASMWorker~handleC
list.description: function for handling parametrization of C-based Web Assembly functions
